DOC.brief_summary: This open-label , multicenter study evaluate safety efficacy RO5185426 patient BRAF V600 mutation-positive , surgically incurable unresectable stage IIIC IV metastatic melanoma . Eligible patient receive RO5185426 ( 960 mg twice daily orally ) disease progression unacceptable toxicity occur , safety follow-up 24 month discontinuation study drug .
